message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair play!
I think we can do better than a 50/50 split.  I'm willing to offer you 40% since I know your money will be worth less in the next round.

I understand your point about the inflation, Bob, but I still think we can find a more equitable split. Let's compromise - I'll take 55 and you get 45.  It's still a good deal for you considering the inflation.
